okendo_enabled.label: Enable Okendo
okendo_enabled.info: Please ensure Okendo is installed and configured before enabling.

settings.paragraph: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

threshold.label: Free shipping threshold
threshold.info: Min cart subtotal to allow free shipping, in the main shop currency.

countries.label: Allowed countries
countries.info: Comma separated list of country iso codes where free shipping is allowed.

paragraph__setup.content: This is an advanced automated promotion that requires configuration of Shopify Scripts and Theme Settings. Please get support from your web developer.

gwp_product.label: Free gift product
gwp_product.info: Please select a simple product (without variants).

gwp_is_bogo.label: Enable "Buy One Get One"
gwp_is_bogo.info: Customer will receive one free gift per required product (buy products must be selected). Overrides the "Free gift quantity per order" setting.

gwp_customer_tag.label: Customer gift tag
gwp_customer_tag.info: Prevents the selected gift product from being discounted when the customer has already received the product as a gift in a previous order. Must match Shopify Flow and Script Editor customer tag.

paragraph__marketing.content: Global settings, used on all Gift With Purchase sections - you can override this on each section.

description.label: Offer description
description.info: To include the min spend value converted to the customer currency, use the short code [min_spend].

paragraph__conditions.content: Choose the required products customers must add to cart, required min spend value, or combine both conditions.

buy_collection.label: Buy any product(s) from a collection

buy_quantity.label: Minimum quantity to buy
buy_quantity.info: Leave empty if the only requirement is min spend.

min_spend.label: Minimum spend
min_spend.info: Leave empty if the only requirement is to buy product(s).

paragraph__setup.content: This is an advanced automated promotion that requires configuration of Shopify Flow, Shopify Scripts and Theme Settings. Please get support from your web developer.

mia_product.label: MIA product
mia_product.info: Product that customers will receive for free on their next order, based on the customer tag.

mia_tag_prefix.label: Customer MIA tag prefix
mia_tag_prefix.info: Customers tagged will qualify for the free MIA product on their next order. Do not include the quantity.

paragraph__marketing.content: Global settings, used on all Missing Items sections - you can override this on each section. Hint: Use the dynamic shortcodes [first_name] and [mia_qty] in title and description fields.

enable_hreflang.label: Enable Hreflang tags
enable_hreflang.info: Make sure that the main settings.hreflang shop metafield is configured in [Accentuate](/admin/apps/accentuate). All products, collections, blogs, pages and shop seo.hreflang metafields must be configured and match all expansion stores as well.

type_header_font.label: Font
type_header_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

type_body_font.label: Font
type_body_font.info: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

include_margins.label: Make section margins the same as theme

paragraph__1.content: List of badges that highlight important aspects of products or brands. Badge definitions are managed via global metafields. [Edit metafields](/admin/apps/accentuate)

image_padding.label: Add image padding
image_padding.info: Select image padding if you don't want your image to be cropped.

color_scheme.label: Color scheme
color_scheme.info: Select image padding to make color visible.

image_padding.label: Add image padding
image_padding.info: Select image padding if you don't want your images to be cropped.

image_padding.label: Add image padding
image_padding.info: Select image padding if you don't want your image to be cropped.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.info: Video plays in a pop-up if the section contains other blocks.
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

image_padding.label: Add image padding
image_padding.info: Select image padding if you don't want your cover image to be cropped.

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

image_ratio.label: Image ratio
image_ratio.info: Add images by editing your collections. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/collections)

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if list includes more collections than shown

email.label: Email
email.info: If left blank, the support email defined in [Accentuate](/admin/apps/accentuate) (Shop scope) or the default shop email defined in [Settings](/admin/settings/general) will be used.

phone.label: Phone Number
phone.info: The default shop phone will be used if left blank.

whatsapp_message.label: Message
whatsapp_message.info: User default message to be sent to the WhatsApp number above.

custom_liquid.label: Custom Liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

article.label: Article
article.info: Leave blank to display the current article's Featured Products, selected via metafields. Note: If you select a specific article, its featured products will be displayed on all pages that share this template.

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/os20/themes-by-shopify/dawn/sections#featured-collection-show-product-rating)

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if blog includes more blog posts than shown

show_image.label: Show featured image
show_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

show_view_all.label: Enable "View all" button if collection has more products than shown

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/os20/themes-by-shopify/dawn/sections#featured-collection-show-product-rating)

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images)

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store)

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/os20/themes-by-shopify/dawn/sections#featured-product-rating)

hide_variants.label: Hide unselected variants’ media on desktop

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: Heading required to display the menu.

header__1.info: Subscribers added automatically to your “accepted marketing” customer list. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers/manage-customers)

header__2.info: To display your social media accounts, link them in your theme settings.

header__4.info: To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

header__6.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

paragraph__conditions.content: Please define the conditions and enable the campaign in Theme Settings. Note: this section is only displayed if the GWP campaign is enabled and the customer does not yet meet the requirements.

paragraph__marketing.content: Overrides the Gift With Purchase global marketing settings. You can define the default for all sections in Theme settings > Gift with purchase.

description.label: Offer description
description.info: To include the min spend value converted to the customer currency, use the short code [min_spend].

enable_sticky_header.label: Enable sticky header
enable_sticky_header.info: Header shows on the screen as customers scroll up.

image_height.label: Banner height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

adapt_height_first_image.label: Adapt section height to first image size
adapt_height_first_image.info: Overwrites image banner height setting when checked.

button_label_1.label: First button label
button_label_1.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

button_label_2.label: Second button label
button_label_2.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

layout.label: Desktop layout
layout.info: Image first is the default mobile layout.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

image_height.label: Featured image height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

paragraph.content: Change excerpts by editing your blog posts. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/blogs/writing-blogs#display-an-excerpt-from-a-blog-post)

image_height.label: Featured image height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 3:2 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

title.label: Name
title.info: Name of the desired cart attribute to be added to the order. [Learn more](https://shopify.dev/api/liquid/objects/cart#cart-attributes)

attribute_value.label: Value
attribute_value.info: If blank, the default value is "Yes".

required.label: Required
required.info: Customers must mark as checked before proceeding to checkout.

checked.label: Pre-checked
checked.info: Not recommended for stores serving EU customers. Read the [GDPR legislation](https://gdpr.eu/gdpr-consent-requirements/).

included_countries.label: Show in countries
included_countries.info: List of country iso codes, separated by comma (eg: AU,UK). Leave empty to show in all countries.

excluded_countries.label: Hide in countries
excluded_countries.info: List of country iso codes, separated by comma (eg: AU,UK).

paragraph.content: Add a description or image by editing your collection. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/collections/collection-layout)

show_collection_image.label: Show collection image
show_collection_image.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/os20/themes-by-shopify/dawn/page-types#product-grid-show-product-rating)

heading.label: Heading
heading.info: Hidden, used for SEO and accessibility.

paragraph__notes.content: The default list of links for each store type (B2B and DTC) is configured via the settings.hreflang shop metafield. [Open Accentuate Metafields](/admin/apps/accentuate).

linklist_fallback.label: Stores menu (fallback)
linklist_fallback.info: Used if there is a problem with the settings.hreflang shop metafield. This menu must have 2 levels, where the 1st level is the store type (B2B, DTC) with empty urls, and the 2nd level is the link for each country/region.

image_ratio.label: Image ratio
image_ratio.info: Add images by editing your collections. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/collections)

show_dynamic_checkout.label: Show dynamic checkout buttons
show_dynamic_checkout.info: Using the payment methods available on your store, customers see their preferred option, like PayPal or Apple Pay. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

featured_image_info.content: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).

title_info.content: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

custom_liquid.label: Custom liquid
custom_liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations.

heading.info: Include a heading that explains the content.
heading.label: Heading

paragraph.content: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/os20/themes-by-shopify/dawn/page-types#product-rating-block)

enable_sticky_info.label: Enable sticky product information on large screens

hide_variants.label: Hide other variants’ media after selecting a variant

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/os20/themes-by-shopify/dawn/page-types#search-results-show-product-rating)

paragraph__setup.content: Please define the conditions and enable the campaign in Theme Settings. Note: this section is only displayed if 1) the Missing Items campaign is enabled, 2) the customer is logged in, and 3) the MIA product is not in the cart.

paragraph__marketing.content: Overrides the Missing Items global marketing settings. You can define the default for all sections in Theme settings > Missing Items. Hint: Use the dynamic shortcodes [first_name] and [mia_qty] in title and description fields.

button_link_target_blank.label: Open link in a new tab

paragraph.content: Each email subscription creates a customer account. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers)
Each email subscription creates a customer account. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/customers)

image_height.label: Banner height
image_height.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

show_text_below.label: Show content below image on mobile
show_text_below.info: For best results, use an image with a 16:9 aspect ratio. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#understanding-image-aspect-ratio)

form_id.label: Klaviyo Form ID
form_id.info: If blank, the Legacy Embed Klaviyo Form will be used on B2B stores (Klaviyo Newsletter ID is required and can be found in Accentuate); or the Shopify Newsletter Form will be used on DTC stores.

product.label: Product
product.info: Optional. By default the grid will display UGC from all products.

link_text.label: Link text
link_text.info: The text which appears on the button visible on hover

min_images.label: Minimum images
min_images.info: If fewer images than this are available, the widget will not appear

enable_autoplay.label: Enable autoplay
enable_autoplay.info: The slider will advance automatically while it is visible on screen

slide_size.label: Slide size
slide_size.info: The size of an individual slide in the carousel. When slides are smaller than 150px (using "X Small" for example) then the review text will no longer appear on hover, only the star rating and link button will remain

arrow_position.label: Arrow position
arrow_position.info: Whether the navigation arrows are positioned inside or outside the slider

product.label: Product
product.info: Optional. By default the grid will display UGC from all products.

link_text.label: Link text
link_text.info: The text which appears on the button visible on hover

enable_autoload_on_scroll.label: Enable autoload on scroll
enable_autoload_on_scroll.info: The grid will automatically load more images as the user scrolls down. Not recommended if there's other content below the grid

enable_load_more.label: Enable load more
enable_load_more.info: Enables the arrow at the bottom of the grid, to load more than the initial selection of images

paragraph__info.content: Use this section when you need different images for mobile and desktop screens.

desktop_image.label: Image (required)
desktop_image.info: The alt text from the mobile image will be used.

link_target_blank.label: Open link in a new tab

loading.label: Loading type
loading.info: Select "Lazy" if the banner is located below the fold (for better page loading speeds).

paragraph__1.content: Extra product information, specified via product metafields. Includes a description only visible to trade customers, when available. [Edit metafields](/admin/apps/accentuate)

Instructions on how to use the product, specified via product metafields. Includes, when available, step title, step description and step media (video or image). [Edit metafields](/admin/apps/accentuate)
List of product ingredients, managed via product metafields. [Edit metafields](/admin/apps/accentuate)
List of product key features that work as major selling points, managed via product metafields. [Edit metafields](/admin/apps/accentuate)
Dynamic recommendations use order and product information to change and improve over time. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/themes/development/recommended-products)

show_rating.label: Show product rating
show_rating.info: To display a rating, add a product rating app. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/online-store/themes/os20/themes-by-shopify/dawn/page-types#product-recommendations-show-product-rating)

video_url.label: URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a YouTube or Vimeo URL

description.label: Video alt text
description.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

image_padding.label: Add image padding
image_padding.info: Select image padding if you don't want your cover image to be cropped.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a video hosted on Shopify

video_filename.label: Video filename
video_filename.info: Upload the video in [Files](/admin/settings/files) and enter the complete filename here (Eg: video-name.mp4).

image_padding.label: Add image padding
image_padding.info: Select image padding if you don't want your cover image to be cropped.

preload.label: Preload options
preload.info: Affects page loading speed - use sparingly.

description.label: Video description
description.info: Describe the video to make it accessible for customers using screen readers.

layout.label: Desktop layout
layout.info: Video first is the default mobile layout.

button_label.label: Button label
button_label.info: Leave the label blank to hide the button.

video_url.label: URL
video_url.placeholder: Use a video hosted on Shopify

image_padding.label: Add image padding
image_padding.info: Select image padding if you don't want your cover image to be cropped.

controls.label: Show play, pause and other controls

autoplay.label: Video autoplays
autoplay.info: Note that videos can only autoplay muted.
